title: How do you kite out of an auto-attackers range?
body: I never quite seem to run far enough while trying to get away from Marksmen and they clip me with autos right at the edge of their range, but when I play one and chase people they always keep right out of my range just by auto-running. wtf is this?

replies.body: You might also try a different attack command than right click. Orb walking or whatever...
Its not only about right clicking on the enemy. You have to move in between attacks to close the distance.

They are cancelling their animation with a movemwnt command just after tge auto fires. If you let it finish you take longer to start walking again or if they are in range then you just stand still instead of chasing.
Ah, thanks. I'll need to practice that more.
